transArray.content: It would be best if there is a laundry room

.Hello dear guests! If you encounter relevant problems during your stay, you can report them to the front desk in time. The hotel is on duty 24 hours a day. We will try our best to help you solve the problem as soon as possible. We are committed to providing you with a cordial and thoughtful stay experience. We sincerely look forward to your visit again!
